title: Over 600 people arrested for violating curfew
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka is under a Nationwide Curfew and over 600 people have been arrested for violating the curfew.
664 people were arrested during the curfew period around 10 PM on Saturday (2) and 6 AM Sunday (3) morning.
Sri Lanka Police said that during an operation underway in Western Province the relevant suspects were arrested.
Public Emergency & Curfew imposed for Public Security – Govt Info Dept
‘Blanket closure of social media is NOT permissible’ – SL Human Rights Chief
